00020 char *mystrdup(const char *str) {
00021   size_t l = std::strlen(str);
00022   char *r = new char[l + 1];
00023   std::strncpy(r, str, l+1);
00024   return r;
00025 }
00026 
00027 char *mystrdup(const std::string &str) {
00028   return mystrdup(str.c_str());
00029 }
00030 }

00032 bool EncoderLearnerTagger::open(LearnerTokenizer      *p0,
00033                                 FreeList<LearnerPath> *p1,
00034                                 FeatureIndex          *p2,
00035                                 size_t eval_size,
00036                                 size_t unk_eval_size) {
00037   close();
00038   tokenizer_      = p0;
00039   path_freelist_  = p1;
00040   feature_index_  = p2;
00041   eval_size_     = eval_size;
00042   unk_eval_size_ = unk_eval_size;
00043   return true;
00044 }

00046 bool DecoderLearnerTagger::open(const Param &param) {
00047   close();
00048   path_freelist__.reset(new FreeList<LearnerPath>(BUF_SIZE));
00049   tokenizer__.reset(new LearnerTokenizer());
00050   feature_index__.reset(new DecoderFeatureIndex);
00051   path_freelist_ = path_freelist__.get();
00052   tokenizer_ = tokenizer__.get();
00053   feature_index_ = feature_index__.get();
00054 
00055   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(tokenizer_->open(param)) << tokenizer_->what();
00056 
00057   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(feature_index_->open(param)) << feature_index_->what();
00058 
00059   return true;
00060 }

00062 bool EncoderLearnerTagger::read(std::istream *is,
00063                                 std::vector<double> *observed) {
00064   char line[BUF_SIZE];
00065   char *column[8];
00066   std::string sentence = "";
00067   std::vector<LearnerNode *> corpus;
00068   ans_path_list_.clear();
00069 
00070   bool eos = false;
00071 
00072   for (;;) {
00073     if (!is->getline(line, sizeof(line))) {
00074       is->clear(std::ios::eofbit|std::ios::badbit);
00075       return true;
00076     }
00077 
00078     eos = (std::strcmp(line, "EOS") == 0 || line[0] == '\0');
00079 
00080     LearnerNode *m = new LearnerNode;
00081     std::memset(m, 0, sizeof(LearnerNode));
00082 
00083     if (eos) {
00084       m->stat = MECAB_EOS_NODE;
00085     } else {
00086       size_t _size = tokenize(line, "\t", column, 2);
00087       CHECK_FALSE(_size == 2) << "format error: " << line;
00088       m->stat    = MECAB_NOR_NODE;
00089       m->surface = mystrdup(column[0]);
00090       m->feature = mystrdup(column[1]);
00091       m->length  = m->rlength = std::strlen(column[0]);
00092     }
00093 
00094     corpus.push_back(m);
00095 
00096     if (eos) break;
00097 
00098     sentence += std::string(column[0]);
00099   }
00100 
00101   CHECK_FALSE(!sentence.empty()) << "empty sentence";
00102 
00103   CHECK_FALSE(eos) << "\"EOS\" is not found";
00104 
00105   begin__.reset_string(sentence);
00106   begin_ = begin__.get();
00107 
00108   initList();
00109 
00110   size_t pos = 0;
00111   for (size_t i = 0; corpus[i]->stat != MECAB_EOS_NODE; ++i) {
00112     LearnerNode *found = 0;
00113     for (LearnerNode *node = lookup(pos); node; node = node->bnext) {
00114       if ( node_cmp_eq(*(corpus[i]), *node, eval_size_, unk_eval_size_) ) {
00115         found = node;
00116         break;
00117       }
00118     }
00119 
00120     // cannot find node even using UNKNOWN WORD PROSESSING
00121     if (!found) {
00122       LearnerNode *node = tokenizer_->getNewNode();
00123       node->surface  = begin_ + pos;
00124       node->length   = node->rlength = std::strlen(corpus[i]->surface);
00125       node->feature  = feature_index_->strdup(corpus[i]->feature);
00126       node->stat     = MECAB_NOR_NODE;
00127       node->fvector  = 0;
00128       node->wcost    = 0.0;
00129       node->bnext    = beginNodeList_[pos];
00130       beginNodeList_[pos] = node;
00131       std::cout << "adding virtual node: " << node->feature << std::endl;
00132     }
00133 
00134     pos += corpus[i]->length;
00135   }
00136 
00137   buildLattice();
00138 
00139   LearnerNode* prev = endNodeList_[0];  // BOS
00140   prev->anext = 0;
00141   pos = 0;
00142 
00143   for (size_t i = 0; i < corpus.size(); ++i) {
00144     LearnerNode *rNode = 0;
00145     for (LearnerNode *node = beginNodeList_[pos]; node; node = node->bnext) {
00146       if (corpus[i]->stat == MECAB_EOS_NODE ||
00147           node_cmp_eq(*(corpus[i]), *node, eval_size_, unk_eval_size_) )
00148         rNode = node;  // take last node
00149     }
00150 
00151     LearnerPath *lpath = 0;
00152     for (LearnerPath *path = rNode->lpath; path; path = path->lnext)
00153       if (prev == path->lnode) {
00154         lpath = path;
00155         break;
00156       }
00157 
00158     CHECK_DIE(lpath->fvector) << "lpath is NULL";
00159     for (const int *f = lpath->fvector; *f != -1; ++f) {
00160       if (*f >= static_cast<long>(observed->size()))
00161         observed->resize(*f + 1);
00162       ++(*observed)[*f];
00163     }
00164 
00165     if (lpath->rnode->stat != MECAB_EOS_NODE) {
00166       for (const int *f = lpath->rnode->fvector; *f != -1; ++f) {
00167         if (*f >= static_cast<long>(observed->size()))
00168           observed->resize(*f + 1);
00169         ++(*observed)[*f];
00170       }
00171     }
00172 
00173     ans_path_list_.push_back(lpath);
00174 
00175     prev->anext = rNode;
00176     prev = rNode;
00177 
00178     if (corpus[i]->stat == MECAB_EOS_NODE) break;
00179 
00180     pos += std::strlen(corpus[i]->surface);
00181   }
00182 
00183   prev->anext = beginNodeList_[len_];  // connect to EOS
00184   beginNodeList_[len_]->anext = 0;
00185 
00186   for (size_t i = 0 ; i < corpus.size(); ++i) {
00187     delete [] corpus[i]->surface;
00188     delete [] corpus[i]->feature;
00189     delete corpus[i];
00190   }
00191 
00192   return true;
00193 }
00194 
00195 int EncoderLearnerTagger::eval(size_t *crr,
00196                                size_t *prec, size_t *recall) const {
00197   int zeroone = 0;
00198 
00199   LearnerNode *res = endNodeList_[0]->next;
00200   LearnerNode *ans = endNodeList_[0]->anext;
00201 
00202   size_t resp = 0;
00203   size_t ansp = 0;
00204 
00205   while (ans->anext && res->next) {
00206     if (resp == ansp) {
00207       if (node_cmp_eq(*ans, *res, eval_size_, unk_eval_size_)) {
00208         ++(*crr);  // same
00209       } else {
00210         zeroone = 1;
00211       }
00212       ++(*prec);
00213       ++(*recall);
00214       res = res->next;
00215       ans = ans->anext;
00216       resp += res->rlength;
00217       ansp += ans->rlength;
00218     } else if (resp < ansp) {
00219       res = res->next;
00220       resp += res->rlength;
00221       zeroone = 1;
00222       ++(*recall);
00223     } else {
00224       ans = ans->anext;
00225       ansp += ans->rlength;
00226       zeroone = 1;
00227       ++(*prec);
00228     }
00229   }
00230 
00231   while (ans->anext) {
00232     ++(*prec);
00233     ans = ans->anext;
00234   }
00235 
00236   while (res->next) {
00237     ++(*recall);
00238     res = res->next;
00239   }
00240 
00241   return zeroone;
00242 }
00243 
00244 bool DecoderLearnerTagger::parse(std::istream* is, std::ostream *os) {
00245   path_freelist_->free();
00246   feature_index_->clear();
00247   tokenizer_->clear();
00248 
00249   if (!begin_) {
00250     begin__.reset(new char[BUF_SIZE * 16]);
00251     begin_ = begin__.get();
00252   }
00253 
00254   if (!is->getline(const_cast<char *>(begin_), BUF_SIZE * 16)) {
00255     is->clear(std::ios::eofbit|std::ios::badbit);
00256     return false;
00257   }
00258 
00259   initList();
00260   buildLattice();
00261   viterbi();
00262 
00263   for (LearnerNode *node = endNodeList_[0]->next;
00264        node->next; node = node->next) {
00265     os->write(node->surface, node->length);
00266     *os << '\t' << node->feature << '\n';
00267   }
00268   *os << "EOS\n";
00269 
00270   return true;
00271 }
00272 
00273 LearnerNode *LearnerTagger::lookup(size_t pos) {
00274   if (beginNodeList_[pos]) return beginNodeList_[pos];
00275   LearnerNode *m = tokenizer_->lookup(begin_ + pos, end_);
00276   beginNodeList_[pos] = m;
00277   return m;
00278 }
00279 
00280 bool LearnerTagger::connect(size_t pos, LearnerNode *_rNode) {
00281   for (LearnerNode *rNode = _rNode ; rNode; rNode = rNode->bnext) {
00282     for (LearnerNode *lNode = endNodeList_[pos]; lNode;
00283          lNode = lNode->enext) {
00284       LearnerPath *path   = path_freelist_->alloc();
00285       std::memset(path, 0, sizeof(Path));
00286       path->rnode   = rNode;
00287       path->lnode   = lNode;
00288       path->fvector = 0;
00289       path->cost    = 0.0;
00290       path->rnode   = rNode;
00291       path->lnode   = lNode;
00292       path->lnext   = rNode->lpath;
00293       rNode->lpath  = path;
00294       path->rnext   = lNode->rpath;
00295       lNode->rpath  = path;
00296       CHECK_FALSE(feature_index_->buildFeature(path))
00297           << feature_index_->what();
00298       CHECK_DIE(path->fvector);
00299     }
00300     size_t x = rNode->rlength + pos;
00301     rNode->enext  = endNodeList_[x];
00302     endNodeList_[x] = rNode;
00303   }
00304 
00305   return true;
00306 }
00307 
00308 bool LearnerTagger::initList() {
00309   if (!begin_) return false;
00310 
00311   len_ = std::strlen(begin_);
00312   end_ = begin_ + len_;
00313 
00314   endNodeList_.resize(len_ + 2);
00315   std::fill(endNodeList_.begin(), endNodeList_.end(),
00316             reinterpret_cast<LearnerNode *>(0));
00317 
00318   beginNodeList_.resize(len_ + 2);
00319   std::fill(beginNodeList_.begin(), beginNodeList_.end(),
00320             reinterpret_cast<LearnerNode *>(0));
00321 
00322   endNodeList_[0] = tokenizer_->getBOSNode();
00323   endNodeList_[0]->surface = begin_;
00324   beginNodeList_[len_] = tokenizer_->getEOSNode();
00325 
00326   return true;
00327 }
00328 
00329 bool LearnerTagger::buildLattice() {
00330   for (int pos = 0; pos <= static_cast<long>(len_);  pos++) {
00331     if (!endNodeList_[pos]) continue;
00332     connect(pos, lookup(pos));
00333   }
00334 
00335   if (!endNodeList_[len_]) {
00336     beginNodeList_[len_] = lookup(len_);
00337     for (size_t pos = len_; static_cast<long>(pos) >= 0;  pos--) {
00338       if (endNodeList_[pos]) {
00339         connect(pos, beginNodeList_[len_]);
00340         break;
00341       }
00342     }
00343   }
00344 
00345   return true;
00346 }
00347 
00348 bool LearnerTagger::viterbi() {
00349   for (int pos = 0;   pos <= static_cast<long>(len_);  ++pos) {
00350     for (LearnerNode *node = beginNodeList_[pos]; node; node = node->bnext) {
00351       double bestc = -1e37;
00352       LearnerNode *best = 0;
00353       feature_index_->calcCost(node);
00354       for (LearnerPath *path = node->lpath; path; path = path->lnext) {
00355         feature_index_->calcCost(path);
00356         double cost = path->cost + path->lnode->cost;
00357         if (cost > bestc) {
00358           bestc = cost;
00359           best  = path->lnode;
00360         }
00361       }
00362 
00363       node->prev = best;
00364       node->cost = bestc;
00365     }
00366   }
00367 
00368   LearnerNode *node = beginNodeList_[len_];  // EOS
00369   for (LearnerNode *prev; node->prev;) {
00370     prev = node->prev;
00371     prev->next = node;
00372     node = prev;
00373   }
00374 
00375   return true;
00376 }
00377 
00378 double EncoderLearnerTagger::gradient(double *expected) {
00379   viterbi();
00380 
00381   for (int pos = 0;   pos <= static_cast<long>(len_);  ++pos)
00382     for (LearnerNode *node = beginNodeList_[pos]; node; node = node->bnext)
00383       calc_alpha(node);
00384 
00385   for (int pos = static_cast<long>(len_); pos >=0;    --pos)
00386     for (LearnerNode *node = endNodeList_[pos]; node; node = node->enext)
00387       calc_beta(node);
00388 
00389   double Z = beginNodeList_[len_]->alpha;  // alpha of EOS
00390 
00391   for (int pos = 0;   pos <= static_cast<long>(len_);  ++pos)
00392     for (LearnerNode *node = beginNodeList_[pos]; node; node = node->bnext)
00393       for (LearnerPath *path = node->lpath; path; path = path->lnext)
00394         calc_expectation(path, expected, Z);
00395 
00396   for (size_t i = 0; i < ans_path_list_.size(); ++i)
00397     Z -= ans_path_list_[i]->cost;
00398 
00399   return Z;
00400 }
00401 
00402 double EncoderLearnerTagger::online_update(double *expected) {
00403   viterbi();
00404 
00405   LearnerNode *prev = endNodeList_[0];
00406   for (LearnerNode *node = prev->next; node; node = node->next) {
00407     for (LearnerPath *path = node->lpath; path; path = path->lnext) {
00408       if (prev == path->lnode) {
00409         calc_online_update(path, expected);
00410         break;
00411       }
00412     }
00413     prev = node;
00414   }
00415 
00416   return 0.0;
00417 }
